items.title: Rebuild Plan and Architecture

items.title: Security and Compliance
items.description: AuthN/Z, CORS/CSRF, RBAC, secrets, uploads, DNT, compliance notes

items.title: Operations and Deployment
items.description: Environments, docker-compose, K8s, observability, scaling, releases

items.title: Testing Strategy
items.description: Unit/integration/e2e, fixtures, CI gates, coverage targets
